short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Link tickets numbers in pull requests with jira, add links to tasks to comment by default and block work-in-progress

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The following settings are available in this extension:
1. Replace tickets numbers in pull requests with links to jira tasks.
2. Add link to jira task for every comment in pull requests.
3. Block merge for pull requests if there is wip or [wip] in the title of pull request.
